entry.title: Photos Post 16: Handwritings, Part 12
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 jpeg of 1902-0000 Handwritten Note events has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the image in the smallest gallery of handwritings: Collection Handwritings.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
